Package zork

Class ActionHandler

java.lang.Object
zork.ActionHandler
public class ActionHandler extends Object
Class to handle more complex commands like use item with item or feed animal

      Method to implement specific constellations of items and Non-Item (and extended classes) to do specific things
      Parameters:
      item - the item which should be used
      nonItem - the Non-Item which should be used
      game - to change data of player and rooms

      Method to implement specific constellations of items and item of the inventory to do specific things
      Parameters:
      item - the item which should be used
      secondItem - the second item which should be used
      game - to change data of player and rooms

    • feedWith

      public void feedWith​(Animal animal, String food, Game game)
      Method feed to feed animals with necessary item and then call method action after fed
      Parameters:
      animal - the animal, which should be fed
      food - Name of the item, which is the food
      game - to change data of player and rooms

    • eat

      public void eat​(String foodName, Player player, boolean isFood)
      Method to eat food as a player
      Parameters:
      foodName - name of the item, which is the food
      player - the current player to get the inventory and other information

    • useRucksack

      public void useRucksack​(Item rucksack, Game game)
      When item rucksack is used the players inventory size will be increased by the rucksacks strength, rucksack gets removed from current room
      Parameters:
      rucksack - Given item the player wants to use
      game - Is given to manipulate game data

    • trackPawprints

      public void trackPawprints​(NonItem tracks, Game game)
      handler for tracking footprints & spawning animals
      Parameters:
      tracks - track nonitem for the player to follow
      game - the game to manipulate & check free ways

    • fightEnemy

      public void fightEnemy​(Item weapon, Enemy enemy, Game game)
      Method to fight enemies
      Parameters:
      weapon - the required weapon
      enemy - the enemy you want to fight
      game - the game to manipulate things

    • criticalStrike

      public void criticalStrike​(Scanner userInput, Enemy enemy, Item weapon) throws InterruptedException
      Method to hit a critical strike (You have to type space as fast as possible) Damage 2*strength of weapon
      Parameters:
      userInput - the scanner to scan input
      enemy - the enemy
      weapon - the weapon the player fights with
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - of sleep function

    • block

      public void block​(Scanner userInput, Enemy enemy, Game game) throws InterruptedException
      Method to block an attack (Player has to type block as fast as possible) Damage to player 20
      Parameters:
      userInput - the scanner to scan input
      enemy - the enemy the player fights against
      game - the game to manipulate player
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - of sleep function

    • attack

      public void attack​(Enemy enemy, Item weapon)
      Method to attack the enemy Damage strength of item
      Parameters:
      weapon - The weapon the player fights with
      enemy - the enemy
